attributes.additional_details: Up to us work one on one with children who need support with all aspects of life and growing up. Helps families work on how to deal with difficulties and strategies on to better theirs and the young persons lives. Schools, medical professionals, social workers as well as families all count on this service as a critical part of our society to help these kids who need suport. For funding to be stopped is going to have a detrimental affect on so many young people's lives. Please help us !
attributes.background: "Up to us" is a charity based early intervention based company. This company helps families with children who need some extra support when it comes to school or home life. Up to us work closely with kids on a one to one basis to help with emotional behaviours etc

rejection.details: You may be able to start a petition to the Scottish Parliament about this. You can contact the clerks of the Public Petitions Committee for advice about this by emailing petitions@scottish.parliament.uk.
